modName: Lethargy - Stamina Oriented Changes for PerMa
summary: Stamina management motivation for T3nd0's Perkus Maximus
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Inspired by SkyRe's combat module.[/size]
[size=1][heading][/size][b][size=5]Features:[/size][/b][size=1][/heading][/size]
[size=3]Buffs and debuffs based on current stamina level:[/size]

[b][size=3][u]Stamina[/u][b] [/b][b][b] [/b][u]Effect[/u][/b][/size][/b]
[size=3]90-100%: 10% more melee weapon damage, 10% better blocking[/size]
[size=3] 75-90%:  No effect[/size]
[size=3] 60-75%:  6% less melee weapon damage, 4% slower bow draw speed[/size]
[size=3] 45-60%:  13% less melee weapon damage, 9% slower bow draw speed[/size]
[size=3] 30-45%:  21% less melee weapon damage, 15% slower bow draw speed[/size]
[size=3] 15-30%:  30% less melee weapon damage, 22% slower bow draw speed[/size]
[size=3]  0-15%:   40% less melee weapon damage, 30% slower bow draw speed[/size]

[size=3]Crossbow reload speed is unaffected.[/size]

[size=3]Stamina now regenerates at full speed, whether you’re in combat or not. [/size][size=2](Was 65% less total regeneration in combat)[/size]
[size=1][heading][/size][b][size=5]Installation:[/size][/b][size=1][/heading][/size]
Use your favourite mod manager or extract the file to your \Skyrim\Data\ folder.

[i][b][color=#ffff00]If you want NPCs to be affected by this mod[/color],[/b][/i] you can use ASIS to make it so. Simply add "xLETHxPerk=1" to ASIS' NPCEnchantFix.ini and run the patcher.
[size=1][heading][/size][b][size=5]Manual Uninstallation:[/size][/b][size=1][/heading][/size]
Delete these files:
\Skyrim\Data\Lethargy.esp
\Skyrim\Data\scripts\LethargyInitialisation.pex
\Skyrim\Data\scripts\source\LethargyInitialisation.psc
author: DevilDuke
